mapper.select: select * from board order by bo_key
mapper.update: update board set bo_name = #{board.bo_name} where bo_key = #{board.bo_key}
mapper.insert: insert into post(po_title, po_content, po_us_key, po_bo_key) values(#{post.po_title}, #{post.po_content}, #{post.po_us_key}, #{post.po_bo_key})
mapper.select: select post.*, bo_name as po_bo_name from post join board on po_bo_key = bo_key where po_key = #{po_key} and PO_UPD < now()
mapper.update: update post set PO_UPD = (now() + 9999999999999) where po_key = #{po_key}
